headline: GreyOrange and Zebra Technologies Launch Real-Time Store Inventory Intelligence
summary: Overhead RFID-based solution drives on-shelf availability to near-100% ATLANTA, Jan. 08, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- GreyOrange, a global leader in hyper-intelligent warehouse orchestration and store inventory software, and Zebra Technologies today announced a strategic partnership delivering near-real-time, item-level store inventory accuracy using overhead RFID and autonomous in-store execution. GreyOrange is a registered independent software vendor (ISV) in Zebra’s award-winning PartnerConnect p
